column2: "Nna Jerubaal a ɔnoara nye Gideon no
column3: na ɔman a wɔka no ho no nyinara soɛɛr ahanamakye
column4: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Harod nsunyiwa ho: nna Midian nseraban no dzi hɔn kwaamu afamu

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Gideon dɛ
column3: Nkorɔfo a wɔka wo ho no dɔɔ so dodow dze ma me dɛ medze Midianfo bɛhyɛ hɔn nsa
column4: bɛyɛ na Israel rutuw hɔnho kyerɛ me dɛ
column5: Mankasa me nsa na ɔagye me."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei bɔ dawur wɔ ɔman no asomu dɛ
column3: Obiara a osuro na no ho popo no
column4: wɔmma ɔnsan n’ekyir na ɔndan mfi bepɔw Gilead ho nkɔ. Na ɔman no mu nyimpa mpemeduonu ebien saan hɔn ekyir kɔree; na ɔkaa mpemdu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Gideon dɛ
column3: Nkorɔfo no da ho dɔɔ so dodow; fa hɔn sian kɔ nsu no ho
column4: na minyiyi hɔn mu memma wo wɔ hɔ: na ɔmbra dɛ
column6: Oyi na ɔnye wo nkɔ no
column7: ɔnoara na ɔnye wo nkɔ; na obiara so a mebɛse wo dɛ
column8: oyi na mma ɔnnye wo nnkɔ no

column2: "Nna ɔdze ɔman no sianee kɔr nsu no ho: na EWURADZE see Gideon dɛ
column3: Obiara a ɔdze ne tɛkyerɛma bɛtafer nsu no bi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkraman tafer no
column5: fa no nko gyina nkyɛn; na dɛmara na obiara a ɔkotow n’anankoroma enyim nom no so yɛ."

column2: "Na hɔn mu dodow a wɔtaferee no
column3: dɛ wɔdze hɔn nsa totoo hɔn ano no
column4: wɔyɛ nyimpa ahaasa: na ɔman nkaa no nyinara kotoow hɔn anankoroma enyim noom nsu."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Gideon dɛ
column3: Mbarimba ahaasa a wɔtaferee no na medze bɛgye wo nkwa
column4: na medze Midianfo no ahyɛ wo nsa: na ma ɔman no mu nyimpa biara nkɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Nna ɔman no fefaa edziban na hɔn mbɛn kitsakitsaa hɔn nsamu: na ogyaa Israel mbanyin no nyinara kwan ma wɔkɔr hɔn asesee mu
column3: na osuoo mbarimba ahaasa no ara mu: nna Midian nseraban no wɔ n’ase ɔbɔn no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anadwe no ara
column3: EWURADZE see no dɛ
column4: Soɛr
column5: sian kɔ nseraban no mu; na medze ahyɛ wo nsa."

column2: "Na sɛ isuro dɛ ibesian akɔ a
column3: ɔno nye w’akowaa Pura nsian nkɔ nseraban no mu:"

column2: "na ebɛtse dza wɔreka; na n’ekyir no ɔbɛhyɛ w’abaw dzen ma eesian akɔ nseraban no mu. Nna ɔnye n’akowaa Pura sianee kɔr nseraban no mu wɔ mbarimba a woemia no hɔn ano noho."
"Na Midianfo na Amalekfo na boka afamu mba no nyinara boguu ɔbɔn no mu dɛ mbɛbɛw wɔ ɔdodow mu: na hɔn efumpɔnkɔ nnyi mbuano
column3: wɔtse dɛ mpoano anhwea wɔ ɔdodow mu."

column2: "Na aber a Gideon durii no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔtsee dɛ banyin bi reka n’adaaso bi kyerɛ ne nyɛnko
column7: na muhun dɛ atoko boodoo tatar bi pirewii baa Midian nseraban mu
column9: na ɔbɔɔ no ma ɔhwee famu

column2: "Na ne nyɛnko no buae na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Iyi nnyɛ biribiara dɛ Joas ne babanyin Gideon
column4: Israel ɔbarimba no n’afona a: ne nsamu na Nyankopɔn dze Midian

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Gideon tsee adaaso no ne nkae
column4: na ne nkyerɛasee no
column5: ɔkotowee sɔree; na ɔsanee baa Israel nseraban mu
column7: Hom nsoɛr; na EWURADZE dze Midian dɔm no ahyɛ hom nsa."

column2: "Na ɔpaapaa ne mbarimba ahaasa no mu ekuw ebiasa
column3: na ɔdze mbɛn
column4: na ehina pan
column5: nye atsɛn a ɔhyehyɛ ehina no mu

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nhwɛ me
column4: na hom nyɛ dɛmara: na
column6: sɛ mudu nseraban no ano noho a

column2: "Sɛ emi na hɔn a wɔnye me wɔ hɔ no nyinara hɛn abɛn a
column3: ɔno hom so nhɛn mbɛn wɔ nseraban no ne nkyɛn nyinara
column4: na wɔnse dɛ
column5: EWURADZE na Gideon dze nye yi oo."

column2: "Nna Gideon
column3: na mbarimba ɔha a wɔka no ho no
column4: kodur nseraban no ano noho wɔ ɔdasu a odzi finimfin no n’ahyɛse
column5: aber a wɔdze aweɔmfo no sisii ara pɛr no: na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn no
column6: na wɔbobɔɔ ehina no a ɔdzedze hɔn nsamu no."

column2: "Na ekuw ebiasa no hɛɛn mbɛn no
column3: na wɔbobɔɔ ehina no
column4: na wɔdze atsɛn no kitsakitsaa hɔn nsa bankum mu
column5: na mbɛn no wɔ hɔn nsa enyimfa ama wɔdze ahɛn: na wɔtseatseaa mu dɛ
column6: EWURADZE na Gideon afona nye yi oo."

column2: "Na nyimpa no nyinara gyinagyinaa hɔn ananmu twaa nseraban no ho hyiae: na dɔm no nyinara guanguanee; na wɔbɔɔ ose
column3: na wɔkaa hɔn gui."

column2: "Na wɔhɛɛn mbɛn ahaasa no
column3: na EWURADZE maa atamfo no mu ɔbarimba biara maa n’afona do wɔ ne nyɛnko do
column4: na dɔm no nyinara do: na dɔm no guanee araa kodur Bɛt-sitta wɔ Zerera afamu

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba a wofi Naftali
column3: na Aser
column4: na Manaasɛ nyinara mu boaboaa ano

column2: "Na Gideon somaa abɔfo wɔ Efraim nkokodo nkurow nyinara mu
column3: dɛ
column4: Hom nsian nkɔ Midian do
column5: na wɔnkɛgye hɔn nsamu nsu no araa nkodu Bɛt-bara
column6: mekyerɛ Jordan do. Nna Efraim mbarimba nyinara boaa ano
column7: na wɔkɛgyee nsu no araa dze kodur Bɛt-bara

column2: "Na wɔkyeer Midian asafohemfo beenu no
column3: Oreb na Zeeb; na wokum Oreb wɔ Oreb ɔbotan no do
column4: na Zeeb so wokum no wɔ Zeeb nsatwer no ho
column5: na wotsiiw Midian: na wɔdze Oreb na Zeeb hɔn etsir no brɛɛ Gideon wɔ Jordan egya."
